docs.text:
Hey, I'm Bhagavan Bollina
  • 👨🏻‍💻 I'm a Security Engineer at Appsecco
  • 👯 I’m looking to collaborate on Bugcrowd
  • ✍🏻 I write at 0xcriminal, a platform that highlights security-related research focused on the web and cloud native security stuff.
  • 💬 For a more detailed "About Me": Bhagavan Bollina
